About Me

Why am I here?

Bio

in AUgust 2018, I quit my full-time to learn programming with an emphasis on Python. Coding is quickly becoming a passion for me. So far I have experience with Jango, Pandas, Python, HTML, SCSS, Javascript, Tkinter,

Pool Cleaner

From 2013 to 2018 I was employed by Cardinal Aquatech Pools. My responisbilites included driving to customers all over the city and provide maintenance to swimming pools.

Custodian
